item.description:
(Private Class for members of Cultural Care Au Pair, but open to a few additional students at a special price – only $15!)

Join Raw & Living Foods Chef Eden Love for Class 2 in a 5-class series!

Just in time for Valentine's Day... We will spend a little time discussing the properties and benefits of raw cacao and other nutrient-dense superfoods. Then learn how to make a couple blissfully decadent and easy raw chocolate desserts! We will prepare raw chocolate mousse pie, and raw superfood chocolates! Make your sweetie a high-frequency, lusciously decadent treat this Valentine's Day!

All classes held at Alchemy Juice Bar Cafe, 203 New Britain Avenue, Hartford, CT. All classes are $25 per person, except where noted. Register for all 5 classes for only $100, a raw-some deal! To register for classes, please RSVP on Meetup or e-mail Eden at: LoveAliveforLife@gmail.com.

About Eden Love: Eden Love is a super-nutritarian chef-goddess, mama-preneur, passionate teacher of the high-vibration lifestyle, and co-author of the soon-to-be-released Mama-licious: Recipes for a High Vibration Lifestyle, which is a book empowering women and mothers with the information and inspiration to be their most healthy, vibrant & authentic selves. She is also the owner of the company, Love Alive: High-Vibrational Living Foods for Ecstatic Super-Beings. She hand-crafts nutrient-dense, ecstatic living foods, superfoods, chocolates and elixirs made with the frequency of love, joy, and bliss! Eden teaches classes and workshops on a regular basis, empowering others to nourish their whole selves with the most nutrient-dense foods on the planet! Eden is the mother of a very special being of light, Indigo, who is her most profound teacher, and for whom she is immensely grateful. She lives her life every day with the question, “What would love do?” The answers are about opening to her most sacred self – to the creative, succulent, radiant, powerful, light-filled, ecstatic being that she is. In the name of personal and planetary transformation, she urges you to awake, remember who you are, and join her in being LOVE.
item.name: Simply Delicious Raw Chocolate!
